tool_description: Endpoint for getting the price and meta data of a product on Konga
name: Konga Pricing Data
title: Konga Pricing Data

api_list.name: Konga
api_list.description: Endpoint for getting the price and meta data of a product on Konga
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://konga-pricing-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1.0/site/konga"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "konga-pricing-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://konga-pricing-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1.0/site/konga"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "konga-pricing-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
